function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness and knowledge among Indonesian residents about COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and non-compliance with prevention measures","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness campaigns, targeted information dissemination","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, social media, educational apps","People":"Indonesian residents","Owner":"Public health officials, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate public attitudes and behavioral compliance towards disease prevention","Impact":"Risk of ineffective disease control measures and outbreak management","Mitigation":"Behavioral change interventions, community engagement programs, social influence campaigns","Technologies":"Behavioral science insights, social media influence strategies","People":"Indonesian residents","Owner":"Public health officials, community leaders"},{"Description":"Insufficient sociodemographic data analysis for targeted intervention","Impact":"Inability to tailor prevention efforts to specific population groups, leading to gaps in disease control","Mitigation":"Comprehensive sociodemographic surveys, data analysis for targeted intervention planning","Technologies":"Data analytics, epidemiological models, demographic survey tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health officials, research institutions"}]}
